issue.title: [FCD] tuple_cat should be a single variadic signature

discussion.p: The tuple_cat template consists of four overloads and that can concatenate only two tuples. A single variadic signature that can concatenate an arbitrary number of tuples would be preferred.
discussion.blockquote: Adopt a simplified form of the proposal in n2975, restricted to tuples and neither requiring nor outlawing support for other tuple-like types.
